QuestData.Title: Mechanical Egg Sac
QuestData.Description:
<You find a mechanical egg sac inside of the defunct spiderbot.
This doesn't make any sense, robots don't reproduce this way.
Or do they?
Someone in Rustbolt might have the answers.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Mechanical Egg Sac to Vera Lonelycog in Rustbolt on Mechagon Island.
